players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Be vigilant, Bob. I saw you looking at Charlie last night. It might not mean anything, but it's worth considering."
Bob: "I will continue to investigate and gather more clues. I'm keeping an eye on Diana, as she is the mafioso."
